qas.question: Which word has been connected to Saint Thomas Christians of Kerala, India?
What do followers of Jesus call themselves in the Indian subcontinent?
What do the people in the Indian subcontinent call Jesus?
Which term has been associated with Saint Jesus of Isa Masih?
Where do Indians call themselves Isaai?
Which term means followers of Jesus?
Which Christian term is attached to Saint Thomas Christians?
What do people in Nasrani call Jesus?

context: The Syriac term <a0_0><b3_0><b6_0>Nasrani<b6_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/> (Nazarene) has also been attached to the Saint Thomas Christians of Kerala, India. In the <b4_0>Indian subcontinent<b4_0/>, Christians call themselves <a1_0><b5_0>Isaai<b5_0/><a1_0/> (Hindi: ईसाई, Urdu: عیسائی‎), and are also known by this term to adherents of other religions. This is related to the name they call Jesus, '<a2_0><b7_0>Isa Masih<b7_0/><a2_0/>, and literally means 'the followers of 'Isa'.
